name: Blueprint Items Request
title: Blueprint Items Request
author: Apriori
description: GUI for automatic request for items from the logistics network for the selected blueprint. GUI is shown only when you hold a blueprint (or book) that can be built. Nothing needless.
description_original: GUI for automatic request for items from the logistics network for the selected blueprint. GUI is shown only when you hold a blueprint (or book) that can be built. Nothing needless.
